attributes.action: Introduce 'Slow Down Move Over' Driving Law, to Preserve Recovery Driver Lives.
attributes.background:
Recovery Drivers will benefit from safer working areas whilst doing Recoveries on UK's Roads.
When drivers see our Flashing Amber Lights at the Roadside, they should be required to 'Slow Down' to a Safer Speed i.e 50mph and 'Move Over' to another lane where possible to give us a safer working area.

rejection.details: The open petition similar to yours is https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/128491
